text: Nde vhɨra mbara muuŋgi. Nde khaŋ mbui, nde guigira Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar fhura ndɨɨi ndɨkndɨgi vhuuin gum ŋkasŋkagi, nde nta ndirgeŋ vuzvugi. Nde maaŋ mbuim, Fhe Bakɨme Ŋina Ŋaar sios havharɨr zav fhura ndɨɨi ndɨkndɨgir vhuuiŋ gum ŋkasŋkagi, nde khaŋ tɨgɨp havhargip ntan ŋgarɨv sios havharɨri.
